name: Soldier
description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember. You trained as a youth, studied the use of weapons and armor.
equipment: A trophy taken from a fallen enemy
A set of bone dice or deck of cards

feature.name: Military Rank
feature.description: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority.

personalityTraits: I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
ideals: Greater Good. Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others.
Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority.
bonds: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
Someone saved my life on the battlefield. To this day, I will never leave a friend behind.
flaws: The monstrous enemy we faced in battle still leaves me quivering with fear.
I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.
